title: A microRNA diagnostic biomarker for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
details: SA Banack, RA Dunlop, P Mehta, H Mitsumoto… - Brain Communications, 2024
abstract: Blood-based diagnostic biomarkers for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis will improve patient outcomes and positively impact novel drug development. Critical to the development of such biomarkers is robust method validation, optimization and …
